HomePage.greeting: HELLO THERE, WELCOME TO MY SITE
HomePage.MOTIVATION: My journey into web development began with my siblings, who encouraged me to explore a career in tech. Initially, i found it difficult because i wasn't sure how to break into the field, but i was determined to learn code eventually. Watching movies, I always admired the idea of 'the laptop and the hoodie'.This newfound interest led me to expirement with HTML and CSS, spending my high school years building frontend websites and exploring CSS animations. Through trial and error, I realized that being a full-stack developer is where I truly belong.
HomePage.ctaTitle: Are you impressed by my work? Let's talk
HomePage.ctaDescription: I would love nothing more than to hear about your project and how i can be of service.

Features.fourthDescription: This is a step that is very critical to building a proper software and i dedicate my time to ensuring my well designed database.
Features.fifthDescription: Hire me to get you a complete project brief.
